languages.text: {n}Само присутствие Маражая рождает в толпе собравшихся испуганные вздохи и перешептывания. Друкари игнорирует реакции мон-кай на свою персону — он с деланно деловитым интересом оглядывает мостик корабля, изучая каждую деталь взглядом. Несмотря на подчеркнуто небрежную позу, что-то в его теле выдает несвойственное ему напряжение.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to elicit gasps of dismay and whispers from the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with ostentatiously cool interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by the subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Само присутствие Маражая рождает в толпе собравшихся испуганные вздохи и перешептывания. Друкари игнорирует реакции мон-кай на свою персону — он с деланно деловитым интересом оглядывает мостик корабля, изучая каждую деталь взглядом. Несмотря на подчеркнуто небрежную позу, что-то в его теле выдает несвойственное ему напряжение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to cause sighs of dismay and whispers in the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with an ostentatiously businesslike interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by a subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}光是看到玛拉斋的身影，船员之中就爆发出了阵阵沮丧的叹息与窃窃私语。玛拉斋有意忽视着那些人的反应，带着炫耀般的意味仔细检查着舰船的舰桥，一脸冷漠地仔细检查着每个细节。尽管他的态度似乎非常随意，但动作中却带着微妙的紧张感。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to elicit gasps of dismay and whispers from the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with ostentatiously cool interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by the subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}光是看到玛拉斋的身影，船员之中就爆发出了阵阵沮丧的叹息与窃窃私语。玛拉斋有意忽视着那些人的反应，带着炫耀般的意味仔细检查着舰船的舰桥，以商业般的兴趣仔细检查着每个细节。尽管他的态度似乎非常随意，但动作中却带着微妙的紧张感。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Anwesenheit allein reicht aus, um Unmutsbekundungen und Gewisper auszulösen. Der Drukhari ignoriert sämtliche Reaktionen der Chem-Pan-Sey auf seine Anwesenheit und sieht sich auf der Brücke des Schiffs am. Er studiert jedes Detail mit demonstrativ kühlem Interesse. Seine betont lockere Haltung steht im Kontrast zu einer subtilen, ungewöhnlichen Anspannung in seinem Körper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to elicit gasps of dismay and whispers from the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with ostentatiously cool interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by the subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Anwesenheit allein reicht aus, um Unmutsbekundungen und Gewisper auszulösen. Der Drukhari ignoriert sämtliche Reaktionen der Chem-Pan-Sey auf seine Anwesenheit und sieht sich auf der Brücke des Schiffs am. Er studiert jedes Detail mit demonstrativem professionellem Interesse. Seine betont lockere Haltung steht im Kontrast zu einer subtilen, ungewöhnlichen Anspannung in seinem Körper.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La mera presencia de Marazhai basta para arrancar gritos ahogados de consternación y murmullos a la multitud. El Drukhari ignora las reacciones de los mon-keigh a su persona e inspecciona el puente de mando de la nave, examinando todos los detalles con un interés frío. Pese a su actitud indolente, se advierte una sutil e inusual tensión en sus movimientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to elicit gasps of dismay and whispers from the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with ostentatiously cool interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by the subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mera presencia de Marazhai basta para arrancar suspiros de consternación y murmullos a la multitud. El Drukhari ignora las reacciones de los mon-keigh a su persona e inspecciona el puente de mando de la nave, examinando todos los detalles con un interés ostensiblemente formal. Pese a su actitud indolente, se advierte una sutil e inusual tensión en sus movimientos.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La présence de Marazhai suffit à susciter l'effarement de la foule, qui soupire et chuchote. Le Drukhari ignore les réactions des mon-keigh et inspecte la passerelle du vaisseau, dont il examine le moindre détail avec un détachement feint. Son attitude visiblement désinvolte ne parvient pas à dissimuler une légère tension dont il n'est pas coutumier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to elicit gasps of dismay and whispers from the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with ostentatiously cool interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by the subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La présence de Marazhai suffit à susciter l'effarement de la foule, qui soupire et chuchote. Le Drukhari ignore les réactions des mon-keigh et inspecte la passerelle du vaisseau, dont il examine le moindre détail avec un professionnalisme ostensible. Son attitude visiblement désinvolte ne parvient pas à dissimuler une légère tension dont il n'est pas coutumier.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの存在だけで、群衆は呆れたように息を呑む。デュカーリはモン＝ケイの反応を一切無視し、船橋をくまなく観察し、わざとらしいまでに冷静な関心を持って細部まで調べる。何気ない姿勢とは裏腹に、彼の体には微妙な緊張感が漂っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to elicit gasps of dismay and whispers from the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with ostentatiously cool interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by the subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの存在だけで、群衆は呆れたように息を呑む。デュカーリはモン＝ケイの反応を一切無視し、船橋をくまなく観察し、わざとらしいまでに冷静な関心を持って細部まで調べる。何気ない姿勢とは裏腹に、彼の体には微妙な緊張感が漂っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın var oluşu bile kalabalıkta huzursuzluk uğultuları ve fısıltıların yükselmesine yetiyor. Tüm mon-keigh tepkilerini görmezden gelen Drukhari; geminin köprüsünü incelemeye başlıyor, her detayı gösterişli bir ilgiyle irdeliyor. Dikkat çeken rahat duruşu, bedenindeki hafif ve alışılmadık gerginlikle çelişiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's presence alone is enough to elicit gasps of dismay and whispers from the crowd. The Drukhari ignores all mon-keigh reactions to his person and surveys the ship's bridge, examining every detail with ostentatiously cool interest. His markedly casual posture is belied by the subtle and unusual tension in his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın var oluşu bile kalabalıkta huzursuzluk uğultuları ve fısıltılar yükselmesine yetiyor. Drukhari, tüm mon-keigh tepkilerini görmezden geliyor ve geminin köprüsünü incelemeye başlıyor, her detayı gösterişli bir ilgiyle araştırıyor. Dikkat çeken rahat duruşu, bedenindeki hafif ve alışılmadık gerginlikle çelişiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
